name: Balaçera: Bullet Purgatory
description:
Balaçera: Bullet Purgatory is a bullet-hell game where you have to dodge & destroy all the bullets the enemies are shooting at you. Hold your position to get the highest Score.

Controls Action Keyboard & Mouse Controller Move W | A | S | D Left Joystick PointMouse moveRight JoystickShootLeft mouse button Right Trigger DashRight mouse button | Space Left Trigger | East ButtonExitEscape
